segments.text: This kitchen feels like it's heading for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is diligently drying her plate, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is spilling out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's ruining the floor and cabinets slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her lack of attention might cause real damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are climbing for cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool looks so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could tumble and get hurt badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, but it's risky too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The wet floor could make anyone slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this potential for accidents breaks my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside highlights the indoor neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and stop this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a sad sight of overlooked dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR
